description.en:
This script based mod increases the speed of production points as well as storage capacities by a consistent factor
Changelog: 0.2.1.0 - Created scaffolding for Types & Goals. 0.2.0.0 - All XML config types loading, overriding working as expected. 0.1.0.0 - XML configs loading, and applied to in-game productions 0.0.0.3 - found the XML filename for productions via load 0.0.0.2 - got boosting to work via load injection 0.0.0.1 - initial commit
